leftHalf.title: Cyber risk & resilience resources for CISOs
leftHalf.copy:
__Explore insights and solutions for reducing cyber risk and improving threat visibility__

CISOs are masters of balance and adaptability, helping their organization minimize risk and preserve trust in the face of a complex threat landscape.

Yet a variety of factors stand in their way, including rapidly expanding attack surfaces, compliance obligations, and rising expectations from boards and fellow executives. We curated these resources, perspectives, and solutions to help address those challenges.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare helps deliver security everywhere
relatedBlades.copy:
__Our connectivity cloud reduces tech stack bloat and takes the pain out of threat visibility and response__

Cloudflare's connectivity cloud is a unified platform of cloud-native services that provides secure, any-to-any connectivity for the entire IT environment.

Our connectivity cloud is your foundation for security platform consolidation, helping you discover, monitor, and protect attack surfaces all over your business.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare customers boosted security team efficiency by 29%
relatedBlades.copy: New Forrester research found that Cloudflare security services improved security efficiency via centralized visibility, faster detection, and more.

button.elementName: New Forrester study - Cloudflare customers boosted security team efficiency by 29% - CTA

statsFeatures.description: Reduce policy and compliance risk by up to 50% *
Improve DDoS attack response times by up to 75% *
Reduce breach-related legal and compliance costs by up to 50% *
